menuName: Tweaked Health and Difficulty Dmg Multipliers
comment: Removes extra health NPCs gain per level and NPC/PC base health multipliers.

gameSettings.name: fDiffMultHPByPCVE
comment: Damage by player - very easy - default: 2.0

gameSettings.name: fDiffMultHPToPCVE
comment: Damage to player - very easy - default: 0.5

gameSettings.name: fDiffMultHPByPCVH
comment: Damage by player - very hard - default: 0.5

gameSettings.name: fDiffMultHPToPCVH
comment: Damage to player - very hard - default: 2.0

gameSettings.name: fNPCAttributeHealthMult
comment: multiplier for NPC base health - default: 0.5

gameSettings.name: fPCAttributeHealthMult
comment: multiplier for player base health - default: 2.0

gameSettings.name: fNPCHealthLevelBonus
comment: NPC health gain per level - default: 5.0

gameSettings.name: iNPCBasePerLevelHealthMult
comment: NPC base health mult per level - default: 4
